input_args.passage: 'Mark E. Mitchell | Military Wiki - Fandom | Mark E. Mitchell was the first member of the United States Army to be awarded the Distinguished Service Cross during the War in Afghanistan (2001-present), ...'
input_args.claim: 'This is further corroborated by source which highlights that he was the first member of the United States Army to be awarded the Distinguished Service Cross during the War in Afghanistan, and the Battle of Qala-i-Jangi was part of this war.'
